column7: Number (percent) of samples with IGX feature present
column8: Number (percent) of samples with genomic feature present
column9: Number (percent) of samples with immune feature present
column10: logHR (logHR conf. interval) of IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables and both genomic and immune features
column11: logHR of IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables only
column12: logHR (logHR conf. interval) of genomic feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
column13: logHR (logHR conf. interval) of immune feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
column14: HR (HR conf. interval) of IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables and both genomic and immune features
column15: HR (HR conf. interval) of genomic feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
column16: HR (HR conf. interval) of immune feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
column17: P-value (adjusted P-value) of ANOVA test for IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables and both genomic and immune features
column18: P-value (adjusted P-value) of ANOVA test for IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables and genomic feature
column19: P-value (adjusted P-value) of ANOVA test for IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables and immune feature
column20: P-value (adjusted P-value) of ANOVA test for IGX feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
column21: P-value (adjusted P-value) of ANOVA test for genomic feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
column22: P-value (adjusted P-value) of ANOVA test for immune feature controlled by baseline clinical variables
